changelogLink.description: Link displayed in the extension notification to open changelog page.

enableText.description: Text displayed in the extension notification to enable the extension.

extDescription.message: Show a notification when an extension is updated.

extensionWebstoreLink.description: Link displayed in the extension notification.

loadingChangelogText.description: Text displayed in the changelog when retrieving changelog.

sorryChangelogText.description: Text displayed in the changelog when there is no changelog provided.
sorryChangelogText.message: Sorry... there is no changelog detected.

updatedExtensionText.description: Text displayed in the extension notification. Expects extension name to be passed in.

welcomeText.description: Text displayed in the welcome notification.
welcomeText.message: You'll start to see notifications as soon as an extension is updated.
